alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 10:56PM MST until December 10 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches are expected with 5 to 10 inches possible over the mountains. The heaviest snow amounts are expected to occur Saturday night into early Sunday morning. * WHERE...Schweitzer Mountain Road, Clark Fork, Metaline Falls, Springdale-Hunters Road, Bonners Ferry, Ione, Kettle Falls, Priest River, Athol, Northport, Metaline, Chewelah, Tiger, Sandpoint, Fruitland, Orin-Rice Road, Eastport, Colville, Newport, Deer Park, and Flowery Trail Road. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
